Pre-installed wire

It's a first in the world of orthodontics. Braces and wire delivered together inside an indirect bonding tray.

Coming soon
Auto-pilot for teeth
Our indirect bonding trays are made via 3D printing. So they fit perfectly - everytime. And, brackets are pre-installed so all you need to do is add adhesive. Delivery is blazing fast and simple.
Learn more >
X
Accuracy & Precision
No guesswork.
Bulls-eye everytime >
Install the wire and let it fly. Finish in a straight wire every time. Spare everyone the discomfort and hassle of 'adjustments'.
Accuracy.
It's all about the setup. >
Computerized setup and positioning of braces. See your results before you start treatment. Put it up on the big HD screen and see what you've been missing.
Precision.
The delivery process. >
A 3D printed indirect bonding tray delivers the braces to the teeth with unrivaled high precision. The virtual setup becomes a physical reality.
Dialed in.
WYSIWYG. No adjustments needed. Tight tolerances and subtle over-corrections ensure that your case finishes in a straight wire - everytime.
Learn more >

Coming soon
All digital
Every case starts with a digital 3D model of teeth. Direct scans are best but alginate impressions can be scanned by our lab as well.
Learn more >
X
Process overview
One.
Scan / impression >
3D Scan (preferred) or physical impression. Alginate or PVS impressions can be submitted for scannine.
Two.
Setup >
Computer simulated outcome (aka setup) is created to position brackets accurately. Brackets are positioned for straight wire mechanics.
Three.
3D print >
3D printed indirect bonding tray(s). Brackets are pre-loaded. Just apply adhesive and deliver.
Beauty & comfort.
Uncomfortable? Annoying? Ugly? Our celebrity patients won’t tolerate it. They don’t have to and neither do you. Looking and feeling completely normal is priority one.
Learn more >
X
Beauty and comfort
Out of Sight.
Not really invisible >
It’s hidden on the back side of the front teeth so that no one can see you have braces.
Small and smooth.
Not edgy >
3x smaller than a regular braces with polishable, convex surfaces. It’s the most comfortable appliance available. Period.
Speak naturally.
Be gabby >
The choice of celebrities and media personalities - because there's a lot riding on these braces.
Eat well.
Spinach please >
Enjoy your meal. Life's too short to worry about your braces.
